Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 3. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR BUCK SERGEANT 4. FIRST THREE GRADES - STAFF SERGEANT, TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR HIGHER 0. NO ANSWER
Q.2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  01. 18 YEARS 02. 19 03. 20 04. 21 05. 22 06. 23 07. 24 08. 25 09. 26-29 10. 30-34 11. 35 YEARS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

Q.3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.4. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEAS (COUNT FROM THE TIME YOU LEFT THE STATES)*  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS, UP TO 12 MONTHS 3. OVER 12 MONTHS, UP TO 18 MONTHS 4. OVER 18 MONTHS, UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS, UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.5. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY WERE YOU IN WHEN YOU CAME TO THE HOSPITAL*  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. SIGNAL CORPS 07. COAST ARTILLERY 08. ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. OTHER 15. MARINES 16. NAVY, C.B.,S 00. NO ANSWER

Q.6. ARE YOU STILL ASSIGNED TO YOUR OLD OUTFIT, OR ARE YOU NOW ASSIGNED TO THE HOSPITAL DETACHMENT OF PATIENTS*  1. STILL ASSIGNED TO OLD OUTFIT 2. ASSIGNED TO HOSPITAL DETACHMENT OF PATIENTS 3. I DON,T KNOW WHERE I AM ASSIGNED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.7. DO YOU FEEL PROUD OF THE COMPANY (BATTERY, SQUADRON, TROOP) YOU WERE IN WHEN YOU ENTERED THE HOSPITAL*  1. YES, VERY PROUD 2. YES, FAIRLY PROUD 3. NO, NOT PROUD 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.8. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED OR UPSET*  1. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED OR UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
Q.9. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY*  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. IT,S ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER
Q.10. ON THE WHOLE, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE ARMY*  1. I LIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 2. I LIKE IT FAIRLY WELL 3. I RATHER DISLIKE IT 4. I DISLIKE THE ARMY VERY MUCH 0. NO ANSWER

Q.11A. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY HAS TRIED ITS BEST TO SEE THAT MEN GET AS SQUARE A DEAL AS POSSIBLE*  1. YES, IT HAS TRIED ITS BEST 2. IT HAS TRIED SOME BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT HAS HARDLY TRIED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.11B. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARMY*  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVE NOT GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER
Q.12. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR IS NOT WORTH FIGHTING*  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.13. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU,VE DONE IN THIS WAR*  1. I FEEL I,VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE AS A SOLDIER AND SHOULD BE SENT HOME 2. I FEEL I,VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE, BUT I,M WILLING TO DO MORE 3. I DON,T FEEL THAT I,VE DONE MY SHARE YET 0. NO ANSWER

Q.14. IF IT HAD BEEN UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A CIVILIAN WORKER IN A WAR JOB*  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.15. IF THE JAPANESE WERE TO OFFER TO STOP FIGHTING NOW AND TO GIVE UP ALL THE COUNTRIES AND TERRITORY THEY HAVE TAKEN OVER, WHAT DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD DO*  1. WE SHOULD ACCEPT THE OFFER AND STOP FIGHTING NOW 2. WE SHOULD CONSIDER THE OFFER AND TRY TO WORK OUT SOME PEACE TERMS WITH THEM 3. WE SHOULD TURN DOWN THE OFFER AND KEEP ON FIGHTING UNTIL THEY GIVE UP COMPLETELY 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.16. WHY ARE YOU IN THE HOSPITAL*  1. GUNSHOT WOUNDS, SHRAPNEL, GRENADES 2. FRACTURE, AMPUTATIONS, BROKEN LEG, BROKEN ARM, STRAINED BACK, ETC. 3. OTHER SURGICAL - APPENDICITIS, RUPTURE, HERNIA OPERATIONS, ETC. 4. STOMACH TROUBLE, ULCERS, DYSENTERY, ETC. 5. OTHER MEDICAL - PNEUMONIA, FEVER, ASTHMA, CHEST PAINS, LUNG TROUBLE, ETC. 6. NERVOUSNESS, DIZZY SPELLS, HEADACHES, FATIGUE, ETC. 7. BURNS (ALL TYPES) 8. UNCLASSIFIABLE (FOR OBSERVATION, DON,T KNOW) 9. MISCELLANEOUS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.17. IF YOU ARE WOUNDED (OR INJURED), WAS YOUR WOUND OR INJURY CAUSED BY ENEMY ACTION*  1. YES, MY PRESENT WOUND OR INJURY WAS DIRECTLY CAUSED BY ENEMY ACTION 2. NO, IT WAS NOT CAUSED BY ENEMY ACTION 3. I AM SICK, NOT WOUNDED OR INJURED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.18. WHAT ISLAND WERE YOU ON WHEN YOU WERE INJURED OR TAKEN SICK*  01. HAWAIIAN ISLANDS (HOSPITALIZED ON SAME ISLAND) 02. HAWAIIAN ISLANDS (HOSPITALIZED ON OTHER ISLAND) 03. PHILLIPINE ISLANDS (LEYTE, MONDORO) 04. MARIANNAS ISLANDS (SAIPAN, GUAM) 05. CAROLINE ISLANDS (PALAU, ULITHI) 06. MARSHALL ISLANDS (ENIWETOK, KWAJALEIN) 07. GILBERT ISLANDS (TARAWA) 08. NEW HEBRIDES (ESPIRITU SANTOS) 09. SOLOMON ISLANDS (GUADALCANAL) 10. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

Q.19. HOW MUCH TIME HAVE YOU SPENT IN THIS HOSPITAL WITH YOUR PRESENT INJURY OR ILLNESS*  1. 10 DAYS OR LESS 2. OVER 10 DAYS, UP TO 20 DAYS 3. OVER 20 DAYS, UP TO ONE MONTH 4. OVER 1 MONTH, UP TO 2 MONTHS 5. OVER 2 MONTHS, UP TO 3 MONTHS 6. OVER 3 MONTHS, UP TO 4 MONTHS 7. OVER 4 MONTHS, UP TO 5 MONTHS 8. OVER 5 MONTHS, UP TO 6 MONTHS 9. OVER 6 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.20. HOW MUCH TIME DID YOU SPEND IN OTHER HOSPITALS OR HOSPITAL SHIPS WITH YOUR PRESENT INJURY OR ILLNESS*  01. I HAVE NOT BEEN IN ANY OTHER HOSPITAL WITH THIS INJURY OR ILLNESS 02. 10 DAYS OR LESS 03. OVER 10 DAYS, UP TO 20 DAYS 04. OVER 20 DAYS, UP TO 1 MONTH 05. OVER 1 MONTH, UP TO 2 MONTHS 06. OVER 2 MONTHS, UP TO 3 MONTHS 07. OVER 3 MONTHS, UP TO 4 MONTHS 08. OVER 4 MONTHS, UP TO 5 MONTHS 09. OVER 5 MONTHS, UP TO 6 MONTHS 10. OVER 6 MONTHS 00. NO ANSWER

Q.21. HOW MUCH OF THE TIME DURING THE DAY ARE YOU SUPPOSED TO SPEND IN BED*  1. I DO NOT HAVE TO SPEND ANY TIME IN BED DURING THE DAY 2. I AM ALLOWED TO BE OUT OF BED MOST OF THE TIME DURING THE DAY 3. I AM SUPPOSED TO SPEND MOST OF MY TIME IN BED, BUT I AM ALLOWED TO GET UP A LITTLE 4. I HAVE TO SPEND ALL OF MY TIME IN BED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.22. HOW MANY OF THE DOCTORS YOU HAVE SEEN IN THIS HOSPITAL DO YOU THINK ARE REALLY GOOD DOCTORS*  1. ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. A FEW OF THEM 5. NONE OF THEM 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23. DO YOU THINK THE DOCTORS AT THIS HOSPITAL TAKE YOUR CASE SERIOUSLY ENOUGH*  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. HAVE THE DOCTORS TOLD YOU AS MUCH ABOUT YOUR CASE AS YOU COULD REASONABLY EXPECT THEM TO TELL YOU UNDER THE CIRCUMSTANCES*  1. THEY HAVE TOLD ME PRACTICALLY NOTHING ABOUT MY CASE 2. THEY HAVE TOLD ME A LITTLE, BUT NOT MUCH 3. THEY HAVE TOLD ME AS MUCH AS I COULD REASONABLY EXPECT THEM TO TELL ME 0. NO ANSWER

Q.25. ARE THE DOCTORS WILLING TO TALK WITH YOU ABOUT YOUR CASE AND LET YOU ASK QUESTIONS ABOUT IT*  1. THEY LET ME ASK, AND THEY TRY TO ANSWER AS WELL AS THEY CAN 2. THEY LET ME ASK, BUT THEY DON,T GIVE ME ANY ANSWERS 3. THEY WON,T EVEN LET ME ASK QUESTIONS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27. DO YOU THINK THAT THE PARTICULAR DOCTOR IN CHARGE OF YOUR CASE IS REALLY COMPETENT*  1. I,M SURE HE IS COMPETENT 2. I THINK HE IS COMPETENT, BUT I,M NOT SURE 3. I DON,T THINK HE,S AS GOOD AS HE SHOULD BE 4. THERE IS NO PARTICULAR DOCTOR IN CHARGE OF MY CASE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.29. DO YOU THINK YOU ARE AS COMFORTABLE IN THIS HOSPITAL AS YOU WOULD BE IN AN ARMY HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAND*  1. YES, I AM JUST AS COMFORTABLE HERE 2. NO, I WOULD BE MORE COMFORTABLE IN AN ARMY HOSPITAL ON THE MAINLAND 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

QUESTION 33B NOT CODED.
